description: High-stretch, semi-soft Italian style cheese specifically formulated for professional pizza baking, offering excellent meltability and a rich creamy flavor profile for culinary excellence.
target_market: Pizzerias, Italian restaurants, and fast-food chains

description: Smooth and creamy processed cheddar slices designed for high-temperature melting in burgers and sandwiches, providing a consistent salty and tangy profile.
target_market: Burger shops, cafes, and breakfast catering services

description: Aged hard cheese finely grated for convenience, featuring a sharp, nutty aroma that enhances the flavor of pasta dishes, salads, and gourmet soups.
target_market: Fine dining establishments and retail consumers

description: Ready-to-bake frozen pizza featuring a thin crust, signature tomato sauce, and Capo's own premium mozzarella, providing a restaurant-quality experience at home.
target_market: Busy professionals and retail grocery shoppers

description: Tender chicken breast fillets coated in a crispy, seasoned breading, flash-frozen to lock in moisture and ensure a crunchy texture upon frying or baking.
Premium ground beef patties with an 80/20 lean-to-fat ratio, minimally processed to maintain a steak-like texture and juicy mouthfeel for high-end burgers.
A thick, herb-infused tomato reduction made from vine-ripened tomatoes, garlic, and Mediterranean spices, perfect as a base for pizzas and dipping.
A rich and velvety emulsion of oil, egg yolks, and roasted garlic, designed to serve as a premium condiment for fries, sandwiches, and seafood.
A fusion condiment combining the creaminess of traditional mayonnaise with the sharp heat of chili peppers, creating a versatile sauce for modern fusion cuisine.
target_market: Sushi bars and trendy fusion restaurants

description: Premium canned tomatoes preserved in their own juice, harvested at peak ripeness to ensure maximum sweetness and nutritional value for sauces and stews.
target_market: Catering companies and industrial food producers

description: Crispy and spicy jalapeño slices preserved in a vinegar-based brine, ideal for adding a kick to nachos, burgers, and Mexican-inspired dishes.
target_market: Mexican restaurants and bar snack providers

description: Vacuum-packed sweet corn kernels, processed within hours of harvest to maintain their natural crunch and sweetness for salads and side dishes.
target_market: Salad bars and school meal programs

description: Cold-pressed olive oil with a low acidity level, featuring a fruity aroma and peppery finish, suitable for dressings and finishing high-end dishes.
A specialized blend of vegetable oils designed for deep-frying, offering a high smoke point and long fry life without flavor transfer between foods.
target_market: High-volume frying operations and industrial kitchens
